name: ZTE CORPORATION
sampleDescriptions: In connection with rendering legal and compliance advice on U.S. law, the firm may respond to and educate U.S. Government officials about ZTE compliance efforts with regard to settlement agreements that the U.S. Departments of Commerce and Justice entered into with ZTE and the work of the settlement compliance monitors.
Discussions concerning the report required by Section 1260J of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2020 (Pub L. 116-92).

Discussions concerning the report required by Section 1260J of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2020 (Pub L. 116-92) and brief officials on ZTE compliance with applicable U.S. law.
